data.title: Read and write data from Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
data.path: PySpark\01 Read and write data from Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.ipynb
data.description: This notebook provides examples of how to read data from ADLS Gen2 account into a Spark context and how to write the output of Spark jobs directly into an ADLS Gen2 location.
